__e: Somebody tell me who decides which woman gets to wear real pearls in this world?
I'm sure that comes in very handy in your line of work.
They don't have pearls for teeth like it says.
In high school, your spring dance... and I put my mother's pearls around your neck... and I told you you were beautiful... because you were.
Maria... are you telling us... that the Moon Princess herself took the Moon pearls? !
Is it worse to take a man's pearls than the flesh off his bones?
And I knew how badly you wanted pearls, I couldn't afford real ones.
And now, just put your pearls back on, And we'll go get some coffee.
Why don't you go play with your beads and things?
